mapper.sql: ATTR_ID , ATTR_NAME, ATTR_TYPE, `STATUS`, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into tb_attribute (ATTR_ID, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_TYPE, `STATUS`, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{attrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into tb_attribute
ATTR_ID,

ATTR_TYPE,
`STATUS`,
OPTION01,

OPTION03,
OPTION04,

mapper.update:
update tb_attribute
ATTR_NAME = #{attrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTR_TYPE = #{attrType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ATTR_ID = #{attrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_attribute set ATTR_NAME = #{attrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTR_TYPE = #{attrType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ATTR_ID = #{attrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.ATTR_ID ,T1.ATTR_NAME ,T1.ATTR_TYPE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_ATTRIBUTE T1

SELECT T1.ATTR_ID ,T1.ATTR_NAME ,T1.ATTR_TYPE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_ATTRIBUTE T1 WHERE T1.ATTR_ID = #{attrId}
